fullAboutHTML:
I am an experienced Software Engineer with over four years of intense, hands-on expertise spanning the entirety of the application development lifecycle, from sophisticated front-end user experience design to robust back-end system architecture and modern cloud deployment.

My skill set includes a range of technologies, such as Node.js, Express.js, React, Next.js, and cloud solutions like Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS. I have extensive experience in microservices architecture and database management, working with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL.

Although I am based in Bangladesh, I am open to remote opportunities worldwide, particularly in full-stack development, microservices, and cloud-based solutions. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that align with business objectives and thrive in collaborative team environments.

On the front-end, my proficiency centers around React and Next.js. My core competencies include:

  • Complex state management (Redux, Zustand)
  • Performance optimization (Memoization, Lazy Loading)
  • SSR & SSG for SEO and speed
  • Type-safe development with TypeScript

My back-end capabilities are anchored by Node.js and Express.js. I design secure RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints, integrating databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL while implementing JWT-based authentication.

Beyond code, I specialize in DevOps using Docker and Kubernetes (K8s). My cloud expertise is centered on AWS, utilizing EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda for serverless architectures.
